FileFormat.FormatName: Quarter Inch Cartridge Host Interchange Format
FileFormat.FormatDescription: Quarter Inch Cartridge tape is a magnetic tape data storage format. The '.qic' software format is based on the QIC113 specification: http://www.qic.org/html/standards/11x.x/qic113g.pdf and conforming files were generated by Microsoft 9x operating systems with the native MSBackup.exe utility.
